text: “ko nona keheda inne..“
anek athata mese apa labadimen pasu yam kalak gathaweddi nithipathi departhamenthuwa haraha owun wenuwen kala yuthu oonama deyak awashya nam sidu karannata hakiya.
eeka ingirisiyenne hadala thiyenne mama nam ingirisi eewa balanne nathi tharam.

obath niyama aaharapanadiyata ruchikathwayak dakwannek nam, kama ganimata, piliyela kirimata, igena ganimata ho kama sama`ga sidu karana oonama deyak sidu kirimata dan obage anaroyidaya wetha aps bagatha kara ganimen oonamak thorathurak, ka්ridawak, mewalam, sithiyam ho wena oonamama ap ekak obe aaharapanadiyen piri jiwithaya samrudhimath karayi.
kiyawayi thamayi, tika dawasakata passe ahayi "ayiye ara wateta suduwata thiyala pinthure inna ekkena kalu karala ganne kohomada?"
pahuwada magul gedaraka yanna set wennada koheda wageyi mathaka.
uktha kamentuwa nisa thunwana parshawayakata sith ridawimak ho sith thawulak ho athi wuye nam siyallangen samawa illa sitimi.
dan aluth awurudda sinhala minisunta sathuta wenuwata genawith aththe asathutaki.
eda amma chikan hadala thibba.
“ kiyala....mata ekaparatama mathak une ape mala wadakara malaya kareka elona hati...balanakota uge apale wahane pitin gihin...

mehi paudgalika depala himikarithwaya, labha aramunu karagena kriyathmaka wima, aayojanaya, beda harima, aadayama, nishpadanaya, bhanda ha sewa mila kirima aadiya welandapola yanthranaya mangin siduwe.
gedara hitiya mage ammayi, thaththayi, nangila dennayi malliyi marala damma.
mama mohothak nihandawa indala, ohu diha baluwa.
mama wedikawe indagena innakota mage hithawathek ma diha balagena pare giya.
purawasiya kanagatuwen ahuwa.
habayi nisiyakarawa prathikara gaththoth godak welawata suwayak laba ganna puluwan.
eeketh me sambanda godak karunu thibuna..
thawaduratath pahadili karanna puluwanda?
mama kohe hari gihin sini nathi kiri nathi the ekak illana hamawelema ee minissu hithanne mata diyawadiyawa kiyala.
hahha ohoma ekak bukiye moda sinhalu sheyar karoth puduma wenna deyak na ban.
aayushmath shariputhrayo dos penwannaha, aayushmath shariputhrayo papaya pilikul karannaha.
ape deshapalanaya waladanna hithagena hitapu ayata, thamange deshapalanaya walalana dawasa langayi kiyala, raten paniwidayak awilla thiyenawa.
ee pawa dun drohiya wibhishanata dewalekuth hadala puja ...
thama niwase mehekariyage diyaniyata thama wiyadamin uganwa pasuwa ayawa wiwaha karadun ohu eeta erehiwa wu samaja apawadayan kerehi nasu kanwa sitiyeya.
mulu mahath pasal paddhathiya ha wishwawidyala janamadhya aadiya pradhana washayen ma karanne apata samajaye athi adhipathiwadi sankalpa iganwima ya.
ek samayekhi bhagyawathun wahanse sawathnuwara samipayehiwu anepindu sitanan wisin...
aluth dewal illa hitina paramparawal bihiwenawa.
laksha gananak kuda mahath panuwanta aakarayaki.
oba me kramawedaya yodaganimin aaraksha wena tharamata, marayata hathiwatena bawa oba danagatha yuthuya.
nuthana bhasha adhyayana anshaya
ese nomathiwa eya hudu deshapalana thiranayak matha pamanak sidu nowiya yuthu ya.

yuddhaye awasana adiyare di, wimukthi koti nayakayan, pa්rabhakaran athu`pawa, kumak karanawa da, kohe sitinawa da kiya nodath satankamin, wimukthi koti athahara, dahas gananin hamudawata barawa siwil wasiyan samaga ekwu hatida, pa්rabhakarange puth chals anthani ge ka්riyawanda pahadili karayi.

ayiyar aththo bisnas karanna upan hapana.
samanya welawata wada hithe gambauru bawak ekthan bawak me welawata danenawa.

lokaye bhayanakama wanija mafiyawan washayen aayudha saha math drawya welundama salake.

kolambaa wesak siri narambaimata paminena ayata hirihara wana aakarayen hasirena ha bauddhagamata nigawana aakaraye wikruthi wes muhunu palandagena mahamanga gaman karana pudgalayan athadanguwata gena...

ee layisthuwe awasan rata thayilanthaya ya.
“api kawadawath mita pera awith naha.
ee wagema mama nagi sitinne dewige sabhawa thula samagiya kara mema aruma puduma uthsahaye kotasak lesa sewaya kirimata waraprasada danenawa.

me sinduwa purawatama ekama deyak gana kiyanna uthsaha karala thiyanawa.ee thamayi widuru kadapatha.habayi api kawuruth danna muna balana kadapatha gana nemeyi me kiyanne kiyala hondin baluwoth penewi.
china wanija guwan yana sansthawa ...
kathawa onna wena paththakata giya.
di uparima wruththiya bhawayak penwu puhunukariniyaka wu aya samanga aasiyanu shurathawa dinaganimen anathuruwa rasa pawathwu suhada sanwadayaki.
eya pawathwaganima abhiyogayak.pasugiya kale mama wedika natya kihipayakatath dayaka wuna.
pirisak dam adinnata wu athara niwasiyo thama gnyathiyage wiyowen kampawata pathwa handamin raya pahan kirimata muhuna demin sitiyoya.
ee karyayedi madhyath, janathawath eeta sahayogaya dunha.
karalwalin bija wen kara gath wigasama thawan kala yuthuya.
namuth amathaka karanna epa mohu maha hithuwakkara minihek......."
in passe ee denna yanna giya.

mak nisada yath, shri lanka wyawasthawe 11 khandaya magin 'kisidu thanaththek wadadim ho hinsanayata, amanushikathwayata ho pahath salakillata ho daduwamata lak nowiya yuthuya' yanna sandahan kara atha.

eheth dedenatama ek saluwak pamanak thibu heyin dedena kathikakota , bamuna rathri kalayedi da baminiya dahawal kalayedi da dharma shrawanayata giya athara, ee yana wita ara saluwa maruwen maruwata handa giyaha.budun wahanse sawathnuwara jethawanaramaye wada wasana ek dinaka rathriye bamunuthema thama sathu saluwa handa, bana asimata giye ya.

udaraye wedanawa da dariya nohaki wiya.ee maha pandara samiyath, diyaniyath ma rohalata gena giyaha.aluyama dekata pamana atha.kasal rohale sewawe nirathawa siti waidyawariya wetha apa samipa wuye asaranayan lesa pihita patha gena ya.rudhira wahanaya hethuwen rohal gatha nokarana bawa aya pawasuwa ya.

aprel ho mayi walin thiyena mathiwaranayen mahinda rajapaksha miyena thurawata nawathath pathwenawa.

eyata amatharawa, podu niyamana, paripalana ha nithi ramuwakata athi nokamaththada eyin pilibimbau we.yuropa digaya nisa eksath rajadhaniya ha sangamaye anekuth samajika ratawal athara siduwu shrama sancharanaya boho durata ek dishawakata sidu wuwaki.
ayidentiti kad eke nambar eka gawata mehe ananyathawaya thahawuru kara ganta bohoma wadagath wenne mobayil nambar eka.
kathandare mula indan baluwa nam mathaka athi me thama yanne perawadana hewath peragamana kiyala.
lingikathwaya wishalama prashnayak wela thiyenne janaaragala wyaparayatayi.

ee wagema rogaya pilibanda saka sahitha mulika awasthawema waidya upadesakata yomu wima , ath sedima , sharirika pawithrathawa niisi lesa pawathwa ganima , rogaya pilibanda saka sahitha pudgalayan sipa walanda ganim ho lingika ekwim walin walakima ( wayirasaya shariraye thanayi thahawuru karana thek) , danena thuwala anathuru athnma eewa aarakshithawa aawaranaya kara ganima , wisheshayenma saukhya kandayame samajikayan rogaya pilibandawa danuwathwa saha salakilimathwa katayuthu kirima thamayi mema awasthawa wana wita “parissam wannata “ kala haki de .

brahaspathinda (09) dinayeth ehi giya apa madhyawedinta dakagannata wuye da ee thaththwayamaya.kanduwura asalin wasa dama athi margaya haraha gaman ganimata pamini gabini mawakatath wate margayakin dura gewagena payin yannayi kiyannata tharam ehi siti hamuda niladharihu amanushika wuha.
helo skandar, nawathath obawa daknata labima nim him nathi prithiyaki.
mema awasthawata sahabhagi wemin selinko layif samagame kalamanakara adhyaksha, aar.
ee sandaha labena sahaya wenuwen sampur balagaraya gedi pitin indiyawata liya dennata sudanamin sitina bawa pasu giya da kiyawini.
oba garilla yuddhaya athharimen, mahajana wimukthi hamudawa sakasime china modalaya bhawitha karannada adahas karanne?

pasugiyada (11) amerikawe woshintan nuwara di pawathi mema hamuwe di rajya saha paudgalika hawul kramawedaya magin paudgalika anshaya balathmaka kirima, deshiya aadayam panatha kriyathmaka kirima pilibandawa amathyawaraya wisin adhyakshawaraya wetha karunu dakwiya paudgalika anshaya sambandhayen katayuthu karana loka banku aayathanayak wana antharjathika mulya sahayogitha aayathanaya, 1956 wasare sita me dakwa kalaya thula a.do. biliyana 1.3 dayakathwayak shri lankawata laba di atha.
naththan wan pathula wage kohe yayida danna.
esema ohuta boho udaw dun aya athara hitapu indiyanu buddhi niladariyakuda we (boho prabhala buddhi sewa wala wishramika kiya deyak natha.

pasugiya 2002 wasare sita kriyathmaka, danata pawathina panathe sandahan widhiwidhana ikmawa nirmanakaruwange da adahas laba ganimin eya sanshodhanaya karana bawa ema karyanshaye adhyaksha janaral githanjali ranawaka mahathmiya "diwayina" ta pawasuwaya.

amerikanu yojanawen pasu masidoniyanu niyojithayada karunu dakwamin kiya sitiye yudamaya thaththwaya nimawata pathwi wasara 4ka kalayak gewi giyada prathisandhanayak bihiwimehila hangawumak pennum nokarana bawayi.
